text: Adelmo Achito Vivas (born 1 March 1934) is a retired Colombian footballer. He competed for the Colombia national football team at the 1962 FIFA World Cup. Vivas was born in Buenaventura, Colombia. Vivas spend most of his career playing for Deportivo Pereira. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers
title: Achito Vivas
